name: MIDINotification
desc: A message that describes a system state change.

items.name: enum MIDINotificationMessageID
items.desc: The types of state changes the system supports.

items.name: var messageID: MIDINotificationMessageID
items.desc: An identifier that describes the type of state change.

items.name: var messageSize: UInt32
items.desc: The size of the message including its ID.
